markdownRemark.html:
I’m proud to be part of the team that built the N26 web app.

Technical Stack

  • React, GraphQL, Express, Redux, ES6
  • Fully prerendered using our Express based middleware
  • Light & dark mode using css custom properties
  • Strong accessibility focus

Alse see my article “Building the N26 Dark Mode” that outlines the engineering and design behind N26’s new dark mode.
